title: Synchrony in metapopulations at multiple time scales: theory, experiments, and field data
abstractText: This is a subsidiary part of a joint proposal. Please see the main proposal with PI Daniel Reuman of Imperial College London.
impactText: None as yet. Publications in progress. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment Policy & public services
findingsText: A time series method called wavelet analysis has been developed to show how populations are synchronised in space and time. Theoretical ecology. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment
